DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effects Etomidate Sevoflurane During Electroconvulsive Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty-five patient total 150 ECT treatment prospective , double-blinded , crossover study . Each patient receive either 0.2 mg/kg etomidate ( Group 1 ) 8 % sevoflurane ( Group 2 ) 100 % oxygen 6 L/min fresh gas flow loss consciousness initial electroconvulsive therapy session . In subsequent session , patient receive alternative sevoflurane concentration alternate dos sixth session . Muscle paralysis achieve 1 mg/kg succinylcholine . Motor ( EMG ) electroencephalography seizure duration ( EEG ) , heart rate ( HR ) mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) value , recovery time recorde .
